name: justichain
description: A secure web platform for anonymous crime reporting and tamper-proof evidence management, bridging trust between communities and law enforcement.

scripts.postinstall: echo '📦 Installing dependencies' pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.start: echo '🚀 Starting Flask server' &&  flask run
scripts.dev: echo '🚀 Starting Flask development server' && flask run --debug --reload
scripts.audit: echo '🔍 Running npm audit' && npm audit
scripts.audit:fix: echo '🛠️ Running npm audit and fixing issues' && npm audit --fix
scripts.update: echo '🔄 Updating npm packages' && npm update
scripts.depcheck: echo '🧐 Checking for unused dependencies' && npx depcheck
scripts.cache-clean: echo '🧹 Cleaning npm cache' && npm cache clean --force
scripts.rebuild-node-modules: echo '🔨 Rebuilding node_modules' && rm -rf node_modules && npm install

author: Armoghan-ul-Mohmin
